rules.natural: Either Food tests Technology, or Food tests Facility.
Provided that Food tests Facility, the Organization does not use Technology.
Under the condition that Technology tests Facility, if Food tests Technology, then the Organization uses Facility.
Whenever Technology operates Facility, Food operates Facility.
Under the condition that the Organization maintains Facility, Technology operates Facility.
Whenever Technology upgrades Facility, then provided that Facility is reactivated, it must have been shut down.
Either Technology upgrades Facility, or Technology repairs Facility.
Under the condition that the Organization develops Technology, if the Organization is not profitable, then the Organization develops Food.
Provided that Technology repairs Facility, Technology replaces Facility.
Under the condition that Technology replaces Facility, then if Facility is reactivated, it was shut down.
If Technology licenses Food, then the Organization does not use Technology.
Provided that Technology licenses Facility, the Organization does not use Technology.
Whenever Technology patents Food, either Technology licenses Food or Technology licenses Facility.
Either Technology patents Food, or Technology patents Facility.
If Technology patents Facility, then either Technology licenses Food or Technology licenses Facility.
Provided that the Organization funds Food, the Organization develops Facility.
Either the Organization funds Food, or the Organization funds Technology.
Under the condition that the Organization funds Technology, the Organization develops Technology.
Either the Organization funds Facility, or the Organization uses Food.
Whenever the Organization uses Food, the Organization is profitable.
Provided that it is not the case that the Organization operates Facility implies the Organization maintains Facility, Facility is reactivated.
Under the condition that it is not the case that the Organization operates Facility implies the Organization maintains Facility, Facility is not shut down.
If it is not the case that the Organization funds Facility implies the Organization is profitable, then the Organization uses Technology.
Under the condition that it is not the case that either the Organization uses Facility or the Organization does not use Technology, the Organization operates Facility.
Provided that the Organization is not profitable, the Organization does not develop Food.

facts.natural: It is not the case that Food operates Facility.
The Organization does not develop Facility.
The Organization does not use Facility.

steps.natural: Either the Organization develops Facility, or the Organization develops Technology.
The Organization develops Technology.
If the Organization is not profitable, then the Organization develops Food.
The Organization is profitable.
If Food tests Technology, then the Organization uses Facility.
Either the Organization uses Facility, or the Organization does not use Technology.
The Organization does not use Technology.
If the Organization funds Facility, then the Organization is profitable.
The Organization is profitable.
If Technology repairs Facility, then whenever Facility is reactivated, it was previously shut down.
If Facility is reactivated, then Facility has been shut down.
If it is not the case that the Organization operates Facility implies the Organization maintains Facility, then Facility is shut down.
If the Organization operates Facility, then the Organization maintains Facility.
Provided that the Organization operates Facility, Technology operates Facility.
Provided that it is not the case that either the Organization uses Facility or the Organization does not use Technology, Technology operates Facility.
Whenever it is not the case that either the Organization uses Facility or the Organization does not use Technology, then Food operates Facility.
Either the Organization uses Facility, or the Organization does not use Technology.
The Organization does not use Technology.
If the Organization funds Facility, then the Organization is profitable.
The Organization is profitable.
Either Technology licenses Food, or Technology licenses Facility.
The Organization does not use Technology.
If the Organization funds Facility, then the Organization is profitable.
The Organization is profitable.

(A10 → A9).natural: If Food tests Technology, then the Organization uses Facility.

(A10 ∨ A11).natural: Either Food tests Technology, or Food tests Facility.

(A11 → ¬A8).natural: Provided that Food tests Facility, the Organization does not use Technology.

(A12 → (A10 → A9)).natural: Under the condition that Technology tests Facility, if Food tests Technology, then the Organization uses Facility.

(A14 → A13).natural: Whenever Technology operates Facility, Food operates Facility.

(A15 → A14).natural: Provided that the Organization operates Facility, Technology operates Facility.

(A15 → A16).natural: If the Organization operates Facility, then the Organization maintains Facility.

(A16 → A14).natural: Under the condition that the Organization maintains Facility, Technology operates Facility.

(A18 → A17).natural: If Facility is reactivated, then Facility has been shut down.

(A19 → (A18 → A17)).natural: Whenever Technology upgrades Facility, then provided that Facility is reactivated, it must have been shut down.

(A19 ∨ A20).natural: Either Technology upgrades Facility, or Technology repairs Facility.

(A2 → (¬G → A1)).natural: Under the condition that the Organization develops Technology, if the Organization is not profitable, then the Organization develops Food.

(A20 → (A18 → A17)).natural: If Technology repairs Facility, then whenever Facility is reactivated, it was previously shut down.

(A20 → A21).natural: Provided that Technology repairs Facility, Technology replaces Facility.

(A21 → (A18 → A17)).natural: Under the condition that Technology replaces Facility, then if Facility is reactivated, it was shut down.

(A22 → ¬A8).natural: If Technology licenses Food, then the Organization does not use Technology.

(A22 ∨ A23).natural: Either Technology licenses Food, or Technology licenses Facility.

(A23 → ¬A8).natural: Provided that Technology licenses Facility, the Organization does not use Technology.

(A24 → (A22 ∨ A23)).natural: Whenever Technology patents Food, either Technology licenses Food or Technology licenses Facility.

(A24 ∨ A25).natural: Either Technology patents Food, or Technology patents Facility.

(A25 → (A22 ∨ A23)).natural: If Technology patents Facility, then either Technology licenses Food or Technology licenses Facility.

(A3 ∨ A2).natural: Either the Organization develops Facility, or the Organization develops Technology.

(A4 → A3).natural: Provided that the Organization funds Food, the Organization develops Facility.

(A4 ∨ A5).natural: Either the Organization funds Food, or the Organization funds Technology.

(A5 → A2).natural: Under the condition that the Organization funds Technology, the Organization develops Technology.

(A6 → G).natural: If the Organization funds Facility, then the Organization is profitable.

(A6 ∨ A7).natural: Either the Organization funds Facility, or the Organization uses Food.

(A7 → G).natural: Whenever the Organization uses Food, the Organization is profitable.

(A9 ∨ ¬A8).natural: Either the Organization uses Facility, or the Organization does not use Technology.

(¬(A15 → A16) → A17).natural: If it is not the case that the Organization operates Facility implies the Organization maintains Facility, then Facility is shut down.

(¬(A15 → A16) → A18).natural: Provided that it is not the case that the Organization operates Facility implies the Organization maintains Facility, Facility is reactivated.

(¬(A15 → A16) → ¬A17).natural: Under the condition that it is not the case that the Organization operates Facility implies the Organization maintains Facility, Facility is not shut down.

(¬(A6 → G) → A8).natural: If it is not the case that the Organization funds Facility implies the Organization is profitable, then the Organization uses Technology.

(¬(A9 ∨ ¬A8) → A13).natural: Whenever it is not the case that either the Organization uses Facility or the Organization does not use Technology, then Food operates Facility.

(¬(A9 ∨ ¬A8) → A14).natural: Provided that it is not the case that either the Organization uses Facility or the Organization does not use Technology, Technology operates Facility.

(¬(A9 ∨ ¬A8) → A15).natural: Under the condition that it is not the case that either the Organization uses Facility or the Organization does not use Technology, the Organization operates Facility.

(¬G → A1).natural: If the Organization is not profitable, then the Organization develops Food.

(¬G → ¬A1).natural: Provided that the Organization is not profitable, the Organization does not develop Food.
